files.patch:
@@ -54,8 +54,0 @@
-    <condition property="include.reports.plugin" value="yes">
-        <contains string="${include.plugins}" substring="coverage_reports"/>
-    </condition>
-
-    <condition property="include.simple.methods.plugin" value="yes">
-        <contains string="${include.plugins}" substring="simple_methods_anc"/>
-    </condition>
-
@@ -101,13 +93,1 @@
-    <target name="clean-reports-plugin" if="include.reports.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/coverage_reports" target="clean">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-        </ant>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="clean-simple-methods-plugin" if="include.simple.methods.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/simple_methods_anc" target="clean">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-        </ant>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="clean" depends="clean-reports-plugin,clean-simple-methods-plugin" description="clean build data">
+    <target name="clean" description="clean build data">
@@ -184,1 +164,1 @@
-    <target name="compile-jcov"  depends="prepare, build-date"
+    <target name="compile"  depends="prepare, build-date"
@@ -205,25 +185,0 @@
-    <target name="compile-reports-plugin" depends="compile-jcov" if="include.reports.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/coverage_reports" target="compile">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-        </ant>
-        <copy todir="${jcov.classes}">
-            <fileset dir="../plugins/coverage_reports/build/classes">
-                <include name="**/*.class"/>
-            </fileset>
-        </copy>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="compile-simple-methods-plugin" depends="compile-jcov" if="include.simple.methods.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/simple_methods_anc" target="compile">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-            <property name="asm.classpath" value="${basedir}/${asm.jar}:${basedir}/${asm.util.jar}:${basedir}/${asm.tree.jar}"/>
-        </ant>
-        <copy todir="${jcov.classes}">
-            <fileset dir="../plugins/simple_methods_anc/build/classes">
-                <include name="**/*.class"/>
-            </fileset>
-        </copy>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="compile" depends="compile-jcov,compile-reports-plugin,compile-simple-methods-plugin"/>
-
@@ -378,1 +333,1 @@
-    <target name="test-jcov" depends="build-jcov,build-network.saver,download-test-dependencies">
+    <target name="test" depends="build-jcov,build-network.saver,download-test-dependencies">
@@ -400,17 +355,0 @@
-
-    <target name="test-reports-plugin" depends="build-jcov" if="include.reports.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/coverage_reports" target="test">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-            <property name="testng.classpath" value="${basedir}/${testngjar}:${basedir}/${jcommanderjar}"/>
-        </ant>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="test-simple-methods-plugin" depends="build-jcov" if="include.simple.methods.plugin">
-        <ant dir="../plugins/simple_methods_anc" target="test">
-            <property name="jcov.classpath" value="${jcov.classes}"/>
-            <property name="asm.classpath" value="${basedir}/${asm.jar}:${basedir}/${asm.util.jar}:${basedir}/${asm.tree.jar}"/>
-            <property name="testng.classpath" value="${basedir}/${testngjar}:${basedir}/${jcommanderjar}"/>
-        </ant>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="test" depends="test-jcov,test-reports-plugin,test-simple-methods-plugin"/>

@@ -37,1 +37,2 @@
-  <property name="jcov.classpath" location="../../JCOV_BUILD/jcov_3.0/jcov.jar"/>
+  <property name="jcov.jar.dir" location="../../JCOV_BUILD/jcov_3.0"/>
+  <property name="jcov.classpath" location="${jcov.jar.dir}/jcov.jar"/>
@@ -40,2 +41,2 @@
-    <!--available file="${jcov.jar}" property="jcov-jar-exists"/>
-    <fail unless="jcov-jar-exists" message="There is no ${jcov.jar}"/-->
+    <available file="${jcov.classpath}" property="jcov-jar-exists"/>
+    <fail unless="jcov-jar-exists" message="There is no ${jcov.jar}"/>
@@ -50,0 +51,4 @@
+  <target name="dist" depends="jar">
+    <copy file="${jar}" todir="${jcov.jar.dir}"/>
+  </target>
+

@@ -37,1 +37,2 @@
-  <property name="jcov.classpath" location="../../JCOV_BUILD/jcov_3.0/jcov.jar"/>
+  <property name="jcov.jar.dir" location="../../JCOV_BUILD/jcov_3.0"/>
+  <property name="jcov.classpath" location="${jcov.jar.dir}/jcov.jar"/>
@@ -41,0 +42,2 @@
+    <available file="${jcov.classpath}" property="jcov-jar-exists"/>
+    <fail unless="jcov-jar-exists" message="There is no ${jcov.jar}"/>
@@ -46,1 +49,5 @@

+     <jar jarfile="${jar}" basedir="${classes}"/>
+  </target>
+
+  <target name="dist" depends="jar">
+    <copy file="${jar}" todir="${jcov.jar.dir}"/>
